hero.description: Discover rental properties with built-in deposit protection, secure payments, and dispute resolution. For tenants and landlords who value security and transparency.

features.title: Everything You Need for Safe Rentals
features.subtitle: Our platform provides comprehensive protection and tools for both tenants and landlords.

secureDeposit.title: Secure Deposit Protection
secureDeposit.description: Your deposits are held in secure escrow accounts with full transparency and protection.

seamlessPayments.title: Seamless Payments
seamlessPayments.description: Automated rent collection and secure payment processing with detailed tracking.

realTimeCommunication.title: Real-time Communication
realTimeCommunication.description: Built-in messaging system for landlords and tenants with instant notifications.

digitalContracts.title: Digital Contracts
digitalContracts.description: Legally binding digital lease agreements with e-signature capabilities.

verifiedUsers.title: Verified Users
verifiedUsers.description: Background checks and verification for both tenants and landlords.

disputeResolution.title: Dispute Resolution
disputeResolution.description: Professional mediation and arbitration services for conflict resolution.

footer.description: Secure house rentals with deposit protection, dispute resolution, and seamless payment processing.
